name: mailblaster-pro-fullstack
description: Full-stack MailBlaster Pro application for Vercel deployment - Updated structure

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to Vercel' && git push origin main
